column33: How did you hear about us?

column10: I was able to continue crossing, but the driver honked and yelled at me, like I was the one doing something wrong. I was in the crosswalk before he even started his turn.; Driver turning left across Lee Hwy, waited for cars before turning but didn't look ahead to see if the crosswalk was occupied and had to come to a complete stop blocking both northbound lanes.
column21: Driver turning left across Lee Hwy, waited for cars before turning but didn't look ahead to see if the crosswalk was occupied and had to come to a complete stop blocking both northbound lanes.
